SELECT T.APP_TYPE_NAME, COUNT( TR.APP_TYPE_ID ) AS NUM FROM STARCLOUDMARKET.SCE_MARKET_APP_TYPE T LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDMARKET.SCE_MARKET_APP_APPTYPE_REL TR ON T.APP_TYPE_ID = TR.APP_TYPE_ID WHERE T.IS_DELETE = 1 AND TR.APP_ID IN ( SELECT AI.APP_ID FROM STARCLOUDMARKET.SCE_MARKET_APP_INFO AI INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT APP_ID FROM STARCLOUDMARKET.SCE_MARKET_APP_VERSION AV WHERE APP_STATUS = '4' AND IS_DELETE = 1 ) AVB ON AI.APP_ID = AVB.APP_ID WHERE AI.IS_DELETE=1 )
GROUP BY T.APP_TYPE_NAME, TR.APP_TYPE_ID
